Class GameWorld

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      GameWorld

public class GameWorld
extends greenfoot.World

A general world class for the Minesweeper game.

Version:
2014.11.11
Author:
Erik Martin

Constructor Summary
GameWorld()
          Creates a world of 32x24 Tile objects, randomly picks which Tile objects have mines, and adds the Tile objects to the world.
 
Method Summary
static void revealMines(Tile tile)
          Once a Tile with a mine is selected, the world reveals all unflagged mines and incorrectly flagged cells.

act, addObject, getBackground, getCellSize, getColorAt, getHeight, getObjects, getObjectsAt, getWidth, numberOfObjects, removeObject, removeObjects, repaint, setActOrder, setBackground, setBackground, setPaintOrder, started, stopped

Constructor Detail

GameWorld

public GameWorld()
Creates a world of 32x24 Tile objects, randomly picks which Tile objects have mines, and adds the Tile objects to the world.

Method Detail

revealMines

public static void revealMines(Tile tile)
Once a Tile with a mine is selected, the world reveals all unflagged mines and incorrectly flagged cells.

Parameters:
tile - the Tile that was incorrectly selected.
